text: Andrews County is a county in the U.S. state of Texas. In 2020, 18,610 people lived there. The county seat is Andrews. == History == Andrews County was made in 1910. == Geography == Andrews County has a total area of 1,501 square miles. === Bordering counties === * Gaines County (north) * Martin County (east) * Midland County (southeast) * Ector County (south) * Winkler County (southwest) * Lea County, New Mexico (west) == People == In 2020, the county had 18,610 people living there. == Places == === City === * Andrews == References == Category:Texas counties
title: Andrews County, Texas
